version_description:
Just in time for Mother’s Day, new themed stickers are provided for you to show love effectively! And we also made a lot of improvements to our app.

- Added stickers about Mother’s Day, showing your love to mum
- Added 8 new layouts to combine 7 photos, providing more choices
- Optimized filter editor to add and change filters at the same time
- Optimized the sticker editor to display the effect better
- Fixed the bug that a filter didn’t show effect

We would love to hear any feedback. As always, let us know what you think of the app and rate us after each update.

[Latest Updates]
- More new frames. Now you can combine up to 9 photos at a time
- More new filters to beautify your photos greatly
- More background colors for you to choose from
- You can copy, flip and zoom the stickers freely
- You can long press the photo to switch photos
- Optimized user interface to select and edit photos conveniently
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

Just in time for Father’s Day! We’ve prepared a new pack of festival stickers for you. It must be sweet to send photos with these stickers for your father!

-A new pack of festival stickers about Father’s Day
-A new pack of glasses stickers, making your photo interesting
-Added more frames for more choices of collage

Your opinions are very valuable! Please tell us what you love and what you hate. We are listening!

- More new beautiful patterns for you to decorate photos
- Added a share page for you to share photos easily
- Provided many selections of specific ratios

Your opinions are very valuable! Please tell us what you love and what you hate. We are listening!

Thank you for your continued support. We’ve taken your suggestions and made the app even better.

-Now you can add texts to your photos with beautiful fonts and backgrounds
-Bug fixes and stability improvements

Come experience our newly added features in Pic Jointer.

To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

-Compatible with iOS 10
-Added Rainbow Sticker Pack and Funny-Face Sticker Pack
-Optimized user interface designs

Thank you for your continued help and support.

Just in time for Halloween! We’ve prepared plenty of Halloween themed stickers and backgrounds for you!

-Brand new Halloween themed stickers and backgrounds
-Optimized the interface designs

Update to combine cool photos to impress your friends!

Just in time for Halloween! We’ve prepared plenty of Halloween themed stickers and backgrounds for you!

-Brand new Halloween themed stickers and backgrounds
-Optimized the interface designs

Update to combine cool photos to impress your friends!

To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

- Added 12 brand new fancy layouts
- Performance improvements to make the app faster

Update to the latest version to get new features!

- Added 36 stylish layouts
- Added a series of gradient backgrounds
- You can adjust the padding and shadow of frames easily
- Change the layout of photos randomly
- Auto save photos to album
- Improve the output quality of images

Download the latest version to experience all the gorgeous available features.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements
New frames available!
A few minor fixes on the back end.

- Amazing new App Design
- Tons of new Stickers
- New stunning cool Fonts
- No more ads
Small bug fixes related to the iPhone X layout.
Fixed the position of the watermark and polished a few areas. Enjoy & please keep sending us feedback so we can make this app even better!
It is now easier to select collages.
New Stickers and Sticker Packs!
Update to fix a crash
A small update with a few improvements and bug fixes
Bug fixes
Fixed a couple of minor issues
Fixed a few minor bugs
A small update with a few improvements and bug fixes
Fixed a couple of minor issues
Summer's almost over and it's time for you to share some amazing collages of your summer vacations! With this release we solved some bugs so that you could have the smoothest experience ever.

Hello collage-addicts! Hope your day was worth creating a nice collage or two. Was it? Then we'll take it from here.

We really want to deliver you the best experience we can. What did we do to achieve that?

We polished the app as much as we could, we went over it again and again, like Leonardo was mastering every single brush stroke of Mona Lisa, like Michelangelo was carving every perfect curve of David, like Enzo Ferrari was polishing every detail of the very first Ferrari 125 S (just a small reminder that we are an Italian company, si si!).

Did we manage? Let us know with a review, we dare you!

Heeellooooo theeeeeree...

Slow and weird, right? We’ve fixed a bug in the app that was significantly slowing it down, much like the greeting of this note, so annoying, ew. Fortunately, starting from now you shouldn’t face anything like that anymore - now it should work fast as a cheetah and as graceful as a swan. Ta-daaa!

Hello creative peeps!

PicJointer team is happy to see you enjoying our app. We put our hearts and souls in it, hoping that you'll have the best experience. In this version we've slightly polished the app and fixed a few bugs.
Ready for summer? Well, so are we! We just fixed a small bug, so it's time for you to go outside and enjoy the sun! And don't forget to choose some lovely frames for your Summer Vacation 2019 album.

HELLO PEOPLE!
A special update to help you fulfil your #10yearchallenge!
Just jump in and create your #10yearchallenge collage in a second. And some bug fixed. Stay fun!

Ready for spring? Well, so are we! We just fixed a small bug, so it's time for you to go outside and play pick-up-sticks, because it's just that time of the year. And don't forget to choose some lovely frames for your Spring Break 2019 albums.

Hello creative peeps!
PicJointer team is happy to see you enjoying our app. We put our hearts and souls in it, hoping that you'll have the best experience. In this version we've slightly polished the app and fixed a few bugs. In the next one we'll probably add some Easter eggs, so you'll have fun not only making collages, but also finding what we've hidden there, hehe.

We know we're in Inktober, but making great collages require the same dedication, precision, and talent as drawing. And we want you to have the best tool to practice your skills. With this release we've fixed some minor bugs - now you don't have any excuse not to share an amazing autumnal collage!

Hello creative peeps!
PicJointer team is happy to see you enjoying our app. We put our hearts and souls in it, hoping that you'll have the best experience. In this version we've slightly polished the app and fixed a few bugs. In the next one we'll probably add some Easter eggs, so you'll have fun not only making collages, but also finding what we've hidden there, hehe.

HELLO PEOPLE!
A special update to help you fulfil your #10yearchallenge!
Just jump in and create your #10yearchallenge collage in a second. And some bug fixed. Stay fun!

Hello collagers!!!
If you haven't noticed, Valentine’s Day is just around the corner! So why don’t you create an amazing collage for your SO with all the best photos of you two together? And yes, we fixed some bugs for you just for this occasion.

Oopsie! A little bug slipped through the cracks with our previous update. But our developers were ready to tackle it! Just in time for you to have a surprising collage ready for Valentine's day. Enjoy!

Ready for spring? Well, so are we! We just fixed a small bug, so it's time for you to go outside and play pick-up-sticks, because it's just that time of the year. And don't forget to choose some lovely frames for your Spring Break 2019 albums.
